description: Metrics from Argo Workflows compatible with multi-Prometheus origins like Thanos.

panels.title: Workflows by Phase in the last $ts

targets.expr:
sum by (prometheus, namespace, queue_name) (rate(argo_workflows_queue_latency_sum{}[1m]))
/
  sum by (prometheus, namespace, queue_name) (rate(argo_workflows_queue_latency_count{}[1m]))

panels.title: Time objects spend waiting in the queue

targets.expr:
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase, name) (argo_workflows_clusterworkflowtemplate_triggered_total{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m]) > 0 unless
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase, name) (argo_workflows_clusterworkflowtemplate_triggered_total{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m] offset 1d)
or
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase, name) (argo_workflows_clusterworkflowtemplate_triggered_total{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m]) > 0 -
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase, name) (argo_workflows_clusterworkflowtemplate_triggered_total{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m] offset 1d)

panels.title: Top 5 Pending Pods by reason in the last $ts

title: Argo Workflows
